metadata.title: CVE-2024-35869 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb:client: guarantee refcounted children from parent session Avoid potentialuse-after-free bugs when walking DFS referrals, mounting and performing DFSfailover by ensuring that all children from parent @tcon->ses are alsorefcounted. They're all needed across the entire DFS mount. Get rid of@tcon->dfs_ses_list while we're at it, too.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
